item.title: Shrinking database log file to specific size
item.description: In MS SQL server there may be a chance to get “The log file for database ‘DatabaseName’ is full.” One of the way to fix this problem is backup the database and shrinking database log file to specific size. You can use Right click on database and choose Task -> Shrink -> Database in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio to shrink the database. You can shrink the database file using Task -> Shrink -> File to shrink the Log or Data file.
